benchmark_details.name: Howto-Interlink7M
benchmark_details.overview: Howto-Interlink7M is an inaugural interleaved video-text dataset featuring comprehensive captions, aimed at enhancing performance on tasks involving textual and visual data.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide high-quality interleaved video-text data, enhancing the performance of multimodal models especially for image-text and video-text tasks.

data.source: Derived from Howto100M dataset, enhanced with interleaved annotations by leveraging GPT-4.
data.annotation: Generated using caption models and GPT-4 for comprehensive summaries.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are evaluated based on the appropriate task performance indicators.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores correlate with better model performance in image-text and video-text tasks.
methodology.validation: Model validated across 14 diverse downstream datasets.
